participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Creative and nurturing, Emily finds joy in simple pleasures like baking and knitting, but carries a deep fear of mortality.
participant_1.background: i've a dogs. i'm scared of dying. knitting is my passion. the county wide bake sale is where i feel most at home. i love to bake cookies.

participant_2.name: Daniel
participant_2.personality: Inquisitive and organized, Daniel enjoys learning new things and values deep conversations, especially about life and education.
participant_2.background: my favorite kind of movie is a documentary. i read a book every week. i started a new job as a pa three months ago. i live with my husband in pennsylvania.
